members.name: CharacterData.data
members.description: Is a DOMString representing the textual data contained in this object.

members.name: CharacterData.length
members.description: Returns an unsigned long representing the size of the string contained in CharacterData.data.

members.name: NonDocumentTypeChildNode.nextElementSibling
members.description: Returns the Element immediately following the specified one in its parent's children list, or null if the specified element is the last one in the list.

members.name: NonDocumentTypeChildNode.previousElementSibling
members.description: Returns the Element immediately prior to the specified one in its parent's children list, or null if the specified element is the first one in the list.

members.name: CharacterData.appendData()
members.description: Appends the given DOMString to the CharacterData.data string; when this method returns, data contains the concatenated DOMString.

members.name: CharacterData.deleteData()
members.description: Removes the specified amount of characters, starting at the specified offset, from the CharacterData.data string; when this method returns, data contains the shortened DOMString.

members.name: CharacterData.insertData()
members.description: Inserts the specified characters, at the specified offset, in the CharacterData.data string; when this method returns, data contains the modified DOMString.

members.name: ChildNode.remove()
members.description: Removes the object from its parent children list.

members.name: CharacterData.replaceData()
members.description: Replaces the specified amount of characters, starting at the specified offset, with the specified DOMString; when this method returns, data contains the modified DOMString.

members.name: CharacterData.substringData()
members.description: Returns a DOMString containing the part of CharacterData.data of the specified length and starting at the specified offset.
